dashboard.question: How to see which environment versions that we are testing?
dashboard.answer: Go Dashboard page and find the Environments Version table.

dashboard.question: Where is the place that I can search test results?
dashboard.answer: Hover on the Dashboad menu, then clicking on search results.

atg.question: How to run ATG tests?
atg.answer:
You perform 2 steps below:
1. Go to ATG -> upload ATG MOAS file. Then uploading MOAS file.
2. Go to ATG -> run scripts. Select data( environment, locale, browser, test cases, ..) then clicking on QUEUE button.

atg.question: How to upload file data( MOAS, Server URLs, COM servers)?
atg.answer: Go to ATG -> upload ATG MOAS file/ upload ATG Server URLs

atg.question: How to use the Content Platform Checker?
atg.answer:
You must prepare two files( MOAS, Content Platform CSV)
1. Go to ATG -> upload ATG MOAS file. Uploading the MOAS file.
2. Go to ATG -> content platform checker. Clicking on Validate button after selecting the Content Platform file.

outpost.question: How to clone an Outpost project that has sub-module project?
outpost.answer:
Use Git command
E.g. git clone --recursive http://stash.leapfrog.com/scm/sqaa/sqaauto_narnia.git
Then go to sqaauto_outpost folder, checkout to master branch git checkout master

outpost.question: How to update the checkout to master/branch of the sub-module repository?
outpost.answer:
Use Git command
git submodule update --remote [branch name]

outpost.question: How to start an outpost?
outpost.answer:
- Go to sqaauto_outpost/oupost folder, update config.xml file.
- Make sure to run bundle command at the first time.
- Then start command line bundle exec ruby outpost_server.rb

utilities.question: How to redeem code for an account?
utilities.answer: Go to Utilities -> pin redemption. Clicking on Redeem PINs button after inputting data( enviroment, locale, email, pin's type).

utilities.question: How to link devices for an account?
utilities.answer: Go to Utilities -> Clicking on Link device button after inputting data( enviroment, username, password, platform).

utilities.question: How to lookup customer?
utilities.answer: Go to Utilities -> lookup customer. Enter email and password then clicking on Lookup Customer button.
